name: BOUNCE dot P8
description:
> !! SEIZURE WARN !! <

King bado and his badlets swiped all the food from the village!

Good thing Billy Ball is bouncing in HOT PURSUIT!!

Addictive action! Set up the perfect trickshot and slam King Bado in an experimental game of trial-and-error

Developed by Patrick Riordan and Aaron Taecker-Wyss

Written in Lua using Pico-8
